Pre-Game Insights: India and South Africa are competing in the Super 12 of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup, Australia 2022.
The match is held at the Perth Stadium, Perth on 30th October 2022 at 04:30 PM IST.
Both teams have played 2 matches in the series and are ranked 1st and 2nd respectively in the points table.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Perth Stadium is balanced with an average first-inning score of 150 runs.
Pacers have been successful at this venue, suggesting the inclusion of pace bowlers in fantasy teams.
